subject: Shipment of the order #SSN3305
description_text:
Hi,

My order #SSN3305 has been send 10.11.2025 but due to " wrong adress data"
has been returned to you. The link says that the package was already picked
by you.
I gave you correct adress, courier didnt contact me, I dont know why he
didint delivered.

Please let me know when you will make a claim to DHL and when my order will
come.

I am waiting for a long time, you've got my payment so I am asking for a
new link to follow new package.

I am sending one again new adress,  maybe now it won't be any problem:
Kacper Myga
WINCENTEGO POLA 21c/20
40-596
666079976

I am waiting for your answer till tommorrow.

conversations.body_text: Hi Kacper Myga,      We apologize for the delayed response. Your original address was incorrect, causing the package to be returned. We have reshipped it to your new address—no need to worry.
Please confirm your new address:  Kacper Kwiecień  Wincentego Pola 21  40-596 Katowice  Poland  +48 666 079 976

Perfect, can i have the tracking number?

czw., 27 lis 2025, 09:25 użytkownik service@simsonn.com

That adress is not correct.

I am sending correct one:

Kacper Kwiecień
WINCENTEGO POLA 21c/20
40-596 Katowice
Phone number: 666079976

czw., 27 lis 2025, 09:26 użytkownik service@simsonn.com

Hi Kacper Myga,    We apologise for any inconvenience caused. We have already arranged for a replacement to be sent, but our German warehouse has yet to update the logistics information. As they do not operate over the weekend, we shall follow up with them on Monday and provide you with an updated tracking link.
